juniorLevels.name: Red Ball
juniorLevels.description: Introduction to tennis fundamentals, coordination, and essential elements of the game. Uses small racquets and foam balls on a smaller court to build confidence and love for the sport.

juniorLevels.name: Green Ball
juniorLevels.description: Focuses on stroke technique and footwork using small to medium racquets with low-pressure balls. Players begin rallying and learning court positioning.

juniorLevels.name: Yellow Ball
juniorLevels.description: Emphasis on tennis fundamentals, stroke technique and development, coordination, and competitive drilling. Players transition to full-court play with regulation balls.

juniorLevels.name: Bronze
juniorLevels.description: Ideal for beginner high school players building foundational skills. Develops proper technique, consistency, and competitive awareness for school team preparation.

juniorLevels.name: Silver
juniorLevels.description: Balance of high-quality instruction, competitive play, and stroke development with emphasis on skill advancement. Requires pro staff approval for placement.

juniorLevels.name: Junior Elite Performance
juniorLevels.description: Advanced program featuring high-impact drills and match play strategy for tournament-level and varsity players. Invitation-only based on pro staff evaluation.

adultPrograms.name: Tennis Aerobics
adultPrograms.description: Fast-paced drills done to music incorporating all tennis shots. A fun, high-energy workout that improves your game and your fitness at the same time.
adultPrograms.signup: No sign-up required — just show up!

adultPrograms.name: Aerobics & Play
adultPrograms.description: Combines cardio tennis drills with open play time. Get a great workout then put your skills to the test in live points.

adultPrograms.name: Open Drill 3.0+
adultPrograms.description: Designed for intermediate players seeking consistent weekday practice opportunities. Work on all aspects of your game in a structured but relaxed environment.

adultPrograms.name: Open Drill 4.0+
adultPrograms.description: Competitive drills for advanced players preparing for league and tournament play. High-intensity point play and match-situation scenarios.

privateLessons.description: One-on-one and small group instruction tailored to your goals. Whether you're picking up a racquet for the first time or fine-tuning your game for competition, our pros will create a personalized plan.

formats.name: Private Lesson
formats.description: Focused one-on-one instruction with a club professional.

formats.name: Semi-Private
formats.description: Share a lesson with a partner at a similar skill level.

formats.name: Small Group
formats.description: Group instruction for friends, families, or teams.

privateLessons.note: Lessons available for both members and non-members. Contact us to schedule at a time that works for you.

courtTimes.primeBooking: Reserve up to 2 weeks in advance
courtTimes.nonPrimeBooking: Reserve up to 24 hours in advance
courtTimes.freeNote: Select off-peak outdoor slots are available at no charge
courtTimes.permanentReservation: Reserve the same court at the same time every week for the entire 38-week indoor season. Contact the front desk for eligibility and conditions.

summerCamps.intro: Our summer tennis camps are the perfect way for kids to stay active, make friends, and develop their tennis skills in a fun, supportive environment. Camps run weekly from mid-June through early August.

camps.name: Little Aces Camp
camps.description: A gentle introduction to tennis through games, mini-court play, and coordination activities. Perfect for first-timers who want to have fun and burn energy.

camps.name: Rally Stars Camp
camps.description: Build real tennis skills in a high-energy camp focused on stroke development, footwork, and friendly competition.

camps.name: Tournament Prep Camp
camps.description: Intensive training for competitive junior players. Morning sessions focus on technical development; afternoons feature match play, strategy, and fitness.

camps.name: High School Prep Camp
camps.description: Designed for players preparing for high school team tryouts and competition. Advanced drills, singles and doubles strategy, and mental toughness training.

policies: Register for individual weeks or the full summer
Full refund if cancelled 7+ days before camp week
